${player} and ${player}, race to finish your drinks. Loser takes 2 additional sips.
${player}, what's your greatest sports achievement? If ${player} isn't impressed, take 2 sips.
Between ${player} and ${player}, whoever bench presses more distributes 3 sips.
${player}, take one sip for each gaming console you currently own.
${player} and ${player}, arm wrestle! Loser takes 3 sips.
${player}, tell us about your most embarrassing rejection or take 4 sips.
${player} chooses which player would survive longest in a zombie apocalypse. ${player} distributes 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, have a staring contest. Loser takes 2 sips.
${player}, truth: what's your technique to impress someone you like? If ${player} thinks it wouldn't work, drink.
Between ${player} and ${player}, whoever has the most matches on dating apps takes 2 sips.
${player}, show the last inappropriate meme you saved or take 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, compare your favorite sports teams. Everyone votes for the best one; loser drinks.
${player}, what car would you buy if money wasn't an issue? If ${player} thinks it's a bad choice, you both drink.
${player} and ${player}, thumb wrestle. Loser takes 2 sips.
${player}, rate everyone's fashion sense. Lowest score takes 2 sips.
Between ${player} and ${player}, whoever has gone longer without washing their sheets takes 2 sips.
${player} shows ${player} the most embarrassing photo on their phone or takes 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, who can do more push-ups? Loser takes that many sips.
${player}, tell us your best dad joke. If ${player} doesn't laugh, you take 2 sips.
Between ${player} and ${player}, whoever spent more on their last haircut takes 2 sips.
${player}, who in this group would be the worst roommate? That person distributes 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, compare your weekend plans. Group votes for whose sounds better; loser drinks.
${player}, if you had to fight someone here, who would it be? ${player} distributes 3 sips.
Between ${player} and ${player}, whoever has more notifications on their phone right now takes 2 sips.
${player} mentally chooses rock, paper, or scissors. ${player} guesses what it is. If wrong, both drink.
